name: Taboos: Cracks
description:
This is a casual game that tests memory. You need to remember the picture and open two identical pictures to unlock the complete picture.
If you don't remember all the pictures at the beginning, you can also try to open the picture by constantly turning it around. Beautiful girls will make you more willing to remember them.


It is said that girls prefer a good memory boyfriend, because this boyfriend can remember many of her hobbies. Let the girls in the game exercise your memory.
